alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern La Salle and northeastern Webb Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1108 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Ranchitos Las Lomas, or 19 miles northeast of Laredo, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ranchitos Las Lomas. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 near mile marker 46, and between mile markers 48 and 49. US Highway 59 near mile marker 808. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
